name: Slap No Slap
description:
5/5 "The possibilities are endless, giving you unlimited replayability and everlasting fun." Simple-reviews.com

* Swipe your finger across the screen, slap sad people to make them happy.

* Top Ninja chain reaction fun.

* Instructions :

Don't let time run out.

Emotions are contagious. Start chain reactions for more points.

Combos (good slaps in the same move) give you the most points :
- Combo x2 = 100 points
- Combo x3 = 300 points
- Combo x4 = 600 points
- Combo x5 = 1000 points
- Combo x6 = 1500 points
- Combo x7 = 2100 points
And so on...

* Features :

- 3 modes (Campaign, Blitz, Slap Party)
- Happy hour (points x2)
- Multitouch (multi-slap) support
- Animated tutorial
- 5 Game Center leaderboards (Best Campaign Score, Best Blitz Score, Best Slap Party Score, Best Combo, Best Chain Reaction)
- High replayability (random generator)
- Suited for colorblind people


* Follow developer news on twitter : http://twitter.com/jpsarda
